subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Toni Kroos and Thomas Mueller scored early in the first half Tuesday, leading visiting Bayern Munich over troubled Arsenal, 3-1, in the first leg of their Champions League second-round matchup.
snippet: Toni Kroos and Thomas Mueller scored early in the first half Tuesday, leading visiting Bayern Munich over troubled Arsenal, 3-1, in the first leg of their Champions League second-round matchup.
